summary: AN ORDINANCE adding a new Section 16.20.200 and 16.20.210 to the Seattle Municipal Code (Ordinance 87983, as amended; the Harbor Code) to prohibit use of a vessel without the required state registration and to require production of a certificate of registration when requested for law enforcement purposes respectively, and adding a new Section 16.20.220 to provide the penalty for violation and amending Section 16.64.040 in connection therewith.
